meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by purpura, a condition characterized by purple or red discolorations on the skin.
meanings.sent1: The purpuric spots on her skin indicated a serious medical condition.
meanings.sent2: The flower had a purpuric hue that stood out in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The purpuric color of the sunset made it look like a painting.
meanings.sent4: Her purpuric cheeks revealed her embarrassment to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The purpuric stain on the carpet was impossible to remove.

meanings.definition: Showing or having the color purple.
meanings.sent1: The purpuric curtains added a royal touch to the room.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was a beautiful purpuric shade that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The purpuric balloons at the party made it feel like a magical kingdom.
meanings.sent4: The purpuric sky at dusk painted a serene picture over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The purpuric flowers in the garden bloomed vibrantly in the sunlight.
